original_text: But you must also choose some other clever men to help you. They must be honest men who respect God. They must not want to take money from people. Choose these men to be officers with authority over groups of the people. They will be leaders of 1,000 people, or 100 people, or 50 people, or 10 people.
korean_text: 너는 또 온 백성 가운데서 능력 있는 사람들 곧 하나님을 두려워하며 진실하며 불의한 이익을 미워하는 자를 살펴서 백성 위에 세워 천부장과 백부장과 오십부장과 십부장을 삼아

sentences.original_text: But you must also choose some other clever men to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 또한 너를 도울 다른 지혜로운 사람들을 선택해야 한다

sentences.original_text: They must be honest men who respect God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님을 경외하는 정직한 사람들이어야 한다

sentences.original_text: They must not want to take money from people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들에게서 돈을 받으려 해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: Choose these men to be officers with authority
They will be leaders of 1,000 people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 천 명을 다스릴 지도자가 될 것이다
